t: Amazon.com: SOMA Smart Home : Alexa Skills
s: Control your SOMA Smart Shades or SOMA Tilt devices with Alexa. You need at least one SOMA Smart Shades or SOMA Tilt device and SOMA Connect hub for this skill to function. To get started: 1) Download the Smart Shades app. Set up the devices using the guidelines provided in the app.
